text:
Ah this sounds a little similar to what I studied - I spent a lot of time learning through YouTube when it came to After Effects and other software.

Before working at Jellyfish Pictures, were you mainly applying for work in London? - and did you find Jellyfish Pictures through an open call? Or did you apply prospectively / or know anyone working there?

It's really useful to know you used Trainee Finder. I have looked at this previously though did not feel confident enough to know if I fit the criteria. I am looking again now to see if perhaps it would be for me. So did Creative Skillset (now ScreenSkills) assist in finding a position?

With your current job, what sort of things have you been working on this week? 

Thanks for the help!
